devdoc.details: Implementation of the `IERC165` interface. * Contracts may inherit from this and call `_registerInterface` to declare their support of an interface.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: See `IERC165.supportsInterface`.     * Time complexity O(1), guaranteed to always use less than 30 000 gas.
